name: A little about me and my blog
content: Hello there,Am victor,a kenyan and a software developer.Am currently studying software engineering at the best school in Kenya,Moringa school.This blog will mostly entail stuff on tech and a little bit of coding.I'll be posting new stuff every thursday of the week and if my week is not that much tight,ill post on saturday of the week too:-)Fell free to hit me up on my email and we can taldk Dev or tech stuff.
